import React , {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import SurahCard from '../components/SurahCard' import NavBar from '../components/Navbar' import axios from 'axios' export default function Home() { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const loadData = async () =>{ let uri = "http://localhost:8000/get-surahs" const response = await axios.get(uri); console.log(response.data.chapters) setData(response.data.chapters) localStorage.setItem("token", token) localStorage.getItem(toke) console.log("surahs data revieved") } useEffect(()=>{ loadData(); }, []); return ( <>
